tool_description: Checks real-time inventory levels to determine if requested quantities are available across multiple warehouses and fulfillment centers.

product_quantities.description: Array of product ID and quantity pairs in format 'productId:quantity'

warehouse_ids.description: Specific warehouses to check inventory in

reserve_on_check.description: Whether to temporarily reserve inventory if available

check_backorder.description: Whether to check for backorder availability

priority_level.description: Priority level for inventory allocation: standard, high, urgent

error_messages: Invalid quantity format: Product quantities must be in 'productId:quantity' format with positive integer quantities.
Insufficient inventory: One or more items do not have sufficient stock available. Check available quantities and adjust order.
Warehouse not found: One or more specified warehouse IDs are invalid. Use valid warehouse identifiers.
Invalid priority level: Priority level must be one of: standard, high, urgent.
Inventory system unavailable: Cannot connect to inventory management system. Try again later or contact support.
usage: Provide product_quantities as an array of 'productId:quantity' strings. Optionally specify warehouse_ids to check specific locations. Set reserve_on_check to true to hold inventory temporarily.

availability_status.description: Overall availability status: fully_available, partially_available, or unavailable

available_items.description: List of items that are fully available

unavailable_items.description: List of items that are not available in requested quantities

reservation_ids.description: Reservation IDs if reserve_on_check was enabled

backorder_info.description: JSON string with backorder availability and estimated dates
